PlayerBuilder Class

declarationpublic class PlayerBuilder : ScriptableObject;
inheritsScriptableObject
namespaceWondeluxeEditor.Build
assemblyWondeluxeEditor.Build

Base builder object for performing configured builds. Should be extended for each supported platform.

Public properties

TextAsset AppScript { get; }

A C# source file where the app version and build numbers will be written to. File must contain fields (or constants) named Versionand Build.
bool AutoRun { get; }

Automatically run the built player.
uint Build { get; set; }

Application build number. Should be incremented on each build.
BuildTarget BuildTarget { get; }

Target build platform. Used to configure BuildPlayerOptions.
BuildTargetGroup BuildTargetGroup { get; }

Target build group. Used to configure BuildPlayerOptions.
string FileExtension { get; }

File extension to apply to the output application file. May be left blank.
string FileName { get; }

File name to use for the output application file.
string FilePath { get; }

Destination path relative to the project folder where the player will be built.
Il2CppCompilerConfiguration Il2CppCompilerConfiguration { get; }

C++ compiler configuration used when compiling generated C++ code (IL2CPP). Used to configure PlayerSettings.
NamedBuildTarget NamedBuildTarget { get; }

Target build platform name. Used to configure PlayerSettings.
string PlatformName { get; }

Platform name of the player. Used for constructing the direcotry name where the built player will be output.
string PlayerPathName { get; }

Destination file path name defining where the application will be built.
string[] Scenes { get; }

The asset paths to the scenes to be included in the build.
ScriptingImplementation ScriptingImplementation { get; }

Backend scripting implementation. Used to configure PlayerSettings. Note that ScriptingImplementation.IL2CPP is only applied if it's supported by the client's environment. If ScriptingImplementation.IL2CPP is not supported, ScriptingImplementation.Mono2x will be applied by default.
bool StrictMode { get; }

Should thebuild option be enabled?
string Version { get; set; }

Application version. Typically a Semantic Version

.

Public methods

void BuildPlayer (bool clean)

Builds the player.
BuildPlayerOptions GetBuildPlayerOptions (bool clean)

Returns configured BuildPlayerOptions used to build the player with.

bool autoIncrementBuild

uint build

Il2CppCompilerConfiguration il2CppCompilerConfiguration
string platformName
SceneAsset[] scenes
ScriptingImplementation scriptingImplementation
bool strictMode

Protected methods

Static public methods

void BuildPlayer (BuildPlayerOptions buildPlayerOptions, string version, uint build, PostBuildProcess postProcess)

Build a Unity application.
